ya10.2.1:2.1: acakkhukānaṁ → acakkhukānaṁ itthīnaṁ (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | sacakkhukānaṁ → sacakkhukānaṁ itthīnaṁ (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | Sacakkhukānaṁ → itaresaṁ sacakkhukānaṁ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:14.1: purisānaṁ → etthantare pāṭho si, cck, sya1ed potthakesu
ya10.2.1:19.1: Sacakkhukānaṁ upapajjantānaṁ → pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ (cck); pañcavokāraṁ uppajjitthāti (pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:26.1: Upekkhāya → vinā somanassena upekkhāya (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | upapajjantānaṁ pavatte upekkhāsampayuttacittassa → somanassavippayuttaupekkhāsampayuttacittassa (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:28.1: ahetukānaṁ → vinā saddhāya (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | sahetukānaṁ → saddhāya (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:32.1: ñāṇavippayuttānaṁ → vinā ñāṇena (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | ñāṇasampayuttānaṁ → ñāṇena (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:41.1: saghānakā → idaṁ padaṁ cck, pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu
ya10.2.1:56.1: Upekkhāya → vinā somanassena upekkhāya (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | upapajjantānaṁ pavatte upekkhāsampayuttacittassa → somanassavippayuttaupekkhāsampayuttacittassa (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:115.1: somanassavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ → nirodhasamāpannānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:158.1: Sacittakānaṁ ahetukānaṁ upapajjantānaṁ → sacittakānaṁ vinā saddhāya upapajjantānaṁ (cck); sacittakānaṁ vinā saddhāya uppajjantānaṁ (pts-vp-pli1) | Sahetukānaṁ upapajjantānaṁ → saddhāya upapajjantānaṁ (cck); saddhāya uppajjantānaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:161.1: Sacittakānaṁ ñāṇavippayuttānaṁ upapajjantānaṁ → sacittakānaṁ vinā ñāṇena upapajjantānaṁ (cck); sacittakānaṁ vinā ñāṇena uppajjantānaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:165.1: Kāmāvacare → idaṁ padaṁ cck, pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu
ya10.2.1:172.1: Asaññasatte arūpe → arūpe asaññasatte (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | Pañcavokāre → idaṁ padaṁ cck, pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu
ya10.2.1:185.1: arūpāvacare → idaṁ padaṁ cck, pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu
ya10.2.1:210.1: Asaññasatte → arūpe asaññasatte (bj, cck, pts-vp-pli1) | Catuvokāre → idaṁ padaṁ cck, pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu
ya10.2.1:387.1: Sabbesaṁ → pañcavokārā (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | acakkhukānaṁ → acakkhukānaṁ kāmāvacaraṁ (si, cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:401.1: cavantānaṁ na purisānaṁ → cavatānaṁ purisānaṁ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:517.1: Sabbesaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe → vinā somanassena uppajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe (cck, pts1ed) | . Somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṁ yassa cittassa anantarā somanassasampayuttapacchimacittaṁ uppajjissati tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṁ somanassindriyañca na uppajjati upekkhindriyañca na uppajjissati → pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ somanassindriyañca (cck, pts1ed)
ya10.2.1:863.1: Asaññasattānaṁ arūpānaṁ → arūpānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ (cck) | Pacchimabhavikānaṁ → catuvokāre pañcavokāre pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṁ (cck); catuvokāre pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:904.1: Asaññasattānaṁ → yassa cittassa anantarā pacchimacittaṁ uppajjissati asaññasattānaṁ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1068.1: eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā → etthantare pāṭho cck, pts1ed potthakesu natthi | eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti → dassetvā kāmāvacaraṁ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1071.1: itthiyo → idaṁ padaṁ cck, pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu
ya10.2.1:1080.1: somanassena upapajjitvā → etthantare pāṭho cck, pts1ed potthakesu
ya10.2.1:1132.1: somanassena upapajjitvā → etthantare pāṭho sya-all pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu natthi
ya10.2.1:1139.1: Yassa cittassa → catuvokāre pañcavokāre yassa cittassa (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1142.1: Yassa cittassa → pañcavokāre yassa cittassa (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1324.1: parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ ghānindriyañca → cavantānaṁ tesaṁ ghānindriyañca (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1478.1: Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ arūpānaṁ → pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṁ arūpānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1575.1: Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ acakkhukānaṁ upapajjantānaṁ → pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ acakkhukānaṁ kāmāvacaraṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ (cck, pts1ed)
ya10.2.1:1651.1: Rūpāvacaraṁ → sacakkhukānaṁ rūpāvacaraṁ (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | kāmāvacaraṁ → saghānakānaṁ (si, cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1718.1: Suddhāvāsānaṁ upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ → suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ (cck), suddāvāsaṁ uppajjantānaṁ asaññasattaṁ uppajjantānaṁ (pts1ed) | pañcavokāraṁ → sacakkhukānaṁ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1720.1: pañcavokāraṁ → sacakkhukānaṁ (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ → tesaṁ sacakkhukānaṁ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1856.1: parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjati → pacchimabhavikānaṁ sacakkhukānaṁ uppajjantānaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjati (pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1953.1: Pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ → pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā pacchimacittaṁ uppajjissati tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1957.1: Somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa → pacchimacittassa (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṁ yassa cittassa anantarā somanassasampayuttapacchimacittaṁ uppajjissati tassa cittassa → upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe (cck, pts1ed)
ya10.2.1:2530.1: Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṁ yassa cittassa anantarā upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittaṁ uppajjissati asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha jīvitindriyaṁ uppajjittha → pañcavokāre pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṁ asaññasattānaṁ ye ca upekkhāya upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ tattha jīvitindriyaṁ uppajjittha (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
